name: Jade Dynasty: The dragon fire
description:
Spring is coming to Jade Dynasty Mobile. Prepare for the new update now!

Buy a house and build your nest, from a garden to interior decorations, bathroom, bedroom, and a dressing room. Show off your pets and espers!

And there's more!
Brand new deification system - when you reach maximum level, you can choose one of three ways to increase your power
New dungeon for high level users: Dreams of Heaven
New tutorial for begginers
New clan challenges
New stylish clothes, accessories and espers!

Jade Dynasty Mobile Key features:
Free-form mounted exploration!
Boundless scenic 3d flight with no height restrictions, fly anywhere you want!
Do not feel like exploring the vast expanses of the Jade Dynasty world solo? Conquer the skies alongside your friends!
Spring is coming to Jade Dynasty Mobile. Prepare for the new update now!

A wide array of character customization options
Broad choice of cosmetic items and accessories at your disposal, create your own unique character!

Massive cross-server PVP battles.
6 schools — noble Jadeon mages, fearless Lupin warriors, cunning Vim swordsmen, serene Skysong healers, mysterious Incense Mages and graceful Yungil. Make your choice, declare a full-scale war on other clans and prove your school to be the strongest!

Advanced clan system
Your clan is your family. Have a wedding, recruit apprentices, build an amicable clan, and unlock special events!

Incredibly optimized for mobile devices HD graphics allowing full appreciation of the elaborate and vibrant landscapes.

Make your choice in the Jade Dynasty world and discover your path to immortality!
